text:
Just a few days ago, director Shoojit Sircar announced his next project , where after Irrfan Khan turned down the role, Vicky Kaushal was brought onboard. The period drama is based on the life of freedom fighter Udham Singh.
While Vicky has been locked for the part, the hunt for the leading lady is still on. According to latest reports, Sara Ali Khan was approached to play the leading lady in the film.
Agencies
After Kedarnath and Simmba, Sara is being considered for a lot of films and we are not surprised.
Instagram
A leading daily claims that the makers of Udham Singh approached Sara Ali Khan for the film but she turned down the offer. The report further claims that Sara is currently looking for experimental and meaty roles.
Twitter
Don't Miss 233 SHARES 870 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES
She is currently shooting for Imtiaz Ali's Love Aaj Kal 2 with Kartik Aaryan and apparently, her dates were also clashing with Udham Singh and that's another reason why she turned it down.
The film is all set to go on the floors in April and will release in 2020.
title: Sara Ali Khan Turns Down Vicky Kaushal Starrer 'Udham Singh' Biopic And The Reason Is Legit!
